description:
The reptilian manager Mappiraja appears at the Screw-Ya with VocaBots Dekapurion, Ketsumakka, and Sexy Queen. They want to build a dance institute on Screw Island to show off Sexy Queen`s sexy moves, and ask Heybot and Nejiru`s help to secure funding. Despite assurances that they`ll receive ample compensation, it is quickly revealed that not everything is on the level...
Source: crunchyroll
